name: Experience
description: Enjoy the pleasures and feeling of being a local. While exploring the different views and tasting scrumptious food of the Philippines. For couples who want to enjoy a safe and luxurious trip, I can offer different once in a lifetime experiences for them. Wether on a splurge or a budget. You'll be sure to have a great time. Or for a group of friends who would like to explore the history or try the street food to get a more intense feel/taste of what the Philippines has to offer. So what are you waiting for? Book now!
